title: Pile of Bones

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rattle (Night): Choose a player. Any non-Unseen visitors they receive will become rattled. Rattled players will receive the image attached to the Rattler role card and will be roleblocked the following two nights. You will be notified if you rattled anyone.
- Spooky Scary (Day, 1 use): Choose a player. They will be roleblocked through immunity and their Defense will be grounded to None for the night bypassing any protective abilities. Your target will be notified at the start of the night.

desc:
Post 1069
*Nothing ever gets under my skin.*
